description: The Loggerhead Hoodie is a lightweight sun protection hoodie akin to their famous Loggerhead Henley. Its “solarshieldability” is perfect for days when you have to stand in the full glory of the sun and need to pack your own shade. Features include the UPF35+ sun protection of 100% polyester fabric (with 50% recycled content), microfiber lined stash pocket and reinforced front kangaroo pocket.
name: Howler Bros Loggerhead Hoodie
